Address.label: Address
Address.value: 2929 WALNUT STREET, PHILADELPHIA, Pennsylvania, 19104, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: FMC is a pure-play crop chemical company. The company has diversified its sales to create a balanced crop chemical portfolio across geographies and crop exposure. Through acquisitions, FMC is now one of the five largest patented crop chemical companies and will continue to develop new products, with a focus on biologicals, through its research and development pipeline.
